text: The #NHS is sending texts to some people to invite them to book a #COVID19 vaccine appointment. These may come from a local NHS service, or from ‘NHSvaccine’.   The NHS will never ask for payment details. Learn more: https://t.co/LUljm0bLoT #Vaccine @HealthwatchWarw @WarksFIS https://t.co/NNCX96KjTk
